name: Out of Zone
description:
Out of Zone -This is a multiplayer game. Game from 3 persons. 3D shooter. In multiplayer mode, a video is presented against everyone, there are 10 players on the map, they are all surrounded by a zone that cannot be left, and if the player goes beyond it, death. In multiplayer mode, there is a store in which there is everything necessary for games (starting with weapons, ending with armor). The game should consist in the fact that at your disposal is everything that you can buy in the store: weapons, etc. The player also has its own radar, thanks to which you can track opponents. The main advantage of the multiplayer game is unconditionally endless ammunition that does not need to be replenished in the store!

The game also has a single-player mode in which you must find out the fate of the missing unit, which had a mission to cover the area, but the connection was lost, reinforcements should be sent the next day after losing the connection, but the main character drove through the wetlands and patrolled, when tracks from the wheels of several cars were suddenly noticed. He followed the trail and an hour later reached the scene, which came as a surprise when he saw the corpses of people from the missing detachment and overturned cars, there wasn’t enough gas to return, so he decides to inspect the square and call for help, and coordinates ...
